## GVTYStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an GVTY Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type GVTYStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeGVTY: T;
    unstakeGVTY?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeGVTY?: undefined;
    unstakeGVTY: T;
    unstakeAllGVTY: boolean;
};
```
